title: How To Find Purpose In What You Do, Overcome Insecurities & Destroy Fear In 2022 EP 1210
description:
As we’re coming into the new year, it’s an opportunity to reinvent yourself. It’s a time to take inventory of what parts of your life you love and the other parts that you want to improve. A big part of achieving greatness in your life is to find purpose and meaning in what you’re doing and learn how to show up as your best self each and every day. In this episode we discuss how to find purpose and meaning in your life with Jay Shetty, how to overcome insecurities and build confidence with Priyanka Chopra, where suffering comes from and how you can maximize your potential in life with Sadhguru, how to not let fear get in the way of your purpose with Lisa Nichols and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1210

Jay Shetty's episode: www.lewishowes.com/953

Lisa Nichols' episode: www.lewishowes.com/979

Sadhguru's episode: www.lewishowes.com/965

Priyanka Chopra's episode: www.lewishowes.com/1067
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
